column3: â€œIt's 12:40P.M., and I'm about to make a bold and daring move....I've just loaded my 43 year old pipe with a beautiful piece of BlackWater flower, and will give you a detailed appraisal of it's effects on this 60 year old mind and body. What the hell...it's after noon.  Before I fire up the bowl, here's a description of the flower top: Big, dense, covered with orange hair and huge crystals.  Very impressive! Ok...here...â€

â€œ3rd Place Indica in 2014 Cannabis Cup, 
This potent strain fu**ing delivers! 
Definitely more of a evening, late night medicine.
Not one to really deliver a creative mind, more of a relaxed state.
IF you EVER get an opportunity to get ahold of authentic Blackwater, 
I truly recommend the experience! 
4.5/5â€

â€œI was fortunate enough to find  Blackwater at my local dispensary today. My budtender recommended it to me after I mentioned I prefer an Indica that packs a punch.
This bud has lots of crystals on the leaves, some purple coloration and a lot of orange hairs, which is nice to see.
The flavour I find to be sort of citrusy, sort of earthy, and quite smooth.
The effects are quick to take hold, I've had about 3 tokes from...â€

â€œI recieved a Blackwater clone from a fellow grower in 2014. The Blackwater strain matures @ around 8 weeks give or take a few days providing there was no lock up due to environmental/nutritional instability. Blackwater is a slow growing low yielding strain when grown indoors. I have yet to experiment with it outdoors. The smoke is rich and smooth with an unmistakable berry like flavor and long lingering aroma. The po...â€
â€œPure indica that cuts through any anxiety. Too much will knock you on your ass.â€

â€œMigraine pain comin on; nausea 6 when I medicated round 2200 or so. Takes bout 5-10 min to start working. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia (a must for me). Body high perfect while it lasted. Head high not strong enough to make me sleepy which is really weird for an Indica. But I may be developing a tolerance also. Still awesome, sweet taste. 2 hours later head & body high have worn off. Again, maybe due to my ne...â€
â€œsome great tasting indica don't plan on doing anything this green packs a huge punch but its a great long lasting high straight to the domeâ€

â€œEvery time I've tried to write a review after vaping Blackwater, I either forget, get distracted or fall asleepğŸ˜‚.  Kills nerve pain (hard to do), crushes insomnia with sleep, doesn't give bad munchies & stops panic attacks.  I always forget what I'm talking about mid-sentence after Blackwater.  TKO &Thank you Urban Greenhouse!!! Amazing indica!!â€

â€œFIre Fire Fireeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeeee
WoW There has been a lot spoken for this strain and it held up its part of the DEAL!!! FIREâ€

â€œSecond time around with this strain I picked up some shatter for $12.50 a half gram. It's 11:45pm & I have been trying to medicate since 8pm, but some weird & stressful stuff prevented me from doing so. 
My blood pressure was so high then I immediately went for blackwater.
Just one dab and my pain was gone, my appetites back, and I'm having a hard time fighting off the sandman.
The flavor is similar to most kush stra...â€
â€œbest weed i have smoked in a long time got super high, great flavorâ€
â€œJust got this amazing tasting concentrate  (PHO wax) of the Blackwater OG, incredible stuff! Instant relaxation and euphoric head buzz, giggles and enlightened outlook :)â€

â€œI know why they call it blackwater OG now. This one really took me by surprise. I toked a single bowl in the vaporizer for a moment, not as long as i usually need to to get proper stoned, but did not finish the entire bowl. I felt i had gotten enough, turned off my vape and decided to make some music. Before i knew it, i was high out of my mind. So high that it took me a while to even realize how high i was. And then...â€
â€œBest strain I have ever found. Very potent. Amazing for severe pain, insomnia, anxiety and nausea. Fast high, but also long lasting. Muscle spasms stop within a minute. My favorite strain.â€

â€œBought it
Took 3 hits
Won 5 games of fortnite solo
Took another hit
Passed out
Best sleep everâ€

â€œThis is the second time I have picked up an 1/8 of this strain. This time from a different source and it is just as good as it was last time. Nice big green buds with some red hairs mixed in. There is also a great deal of crystals covering the buds. The high is perfect for after work or evening time. Heavy indica body high that washes pain away and relaxes muscles. With a nice head high that is always relaxing and pu...â€
â€œtaking a couple dabs of some blackwater shatter is a good way to make a solid bum groove in your favorite seat. locked and loaded as a muh over here.  good lordâ€

â€œBought it
Took 3 hits
Won 5 games of fortnite solo
Took another hit
Passed out
Best sleep everâ€
â€œBest strain I have ever found. Very potent. Amazing for severe pain, insomnia, anxiety and nausea. Fast high, but also long lasting. Muscle spasms stop within a minute. My favorite strain.â€

â€œThis strain is fast becoming a staple in my inventory. This is the third eighth in a row I have purchased. This time from The Greenhouse. I love the heavy indica effects after a hard day's work. And the buds, oh those beautiful dense green nugs with a heavy coating of white.â€

â€œThe only reason I got this strain was because of the budtenders recommendation that this is what everybody comes back for" so because it was my first time at that particular dispensary I trusted her judgement. Upon inspecting it looked above average to great
column4: lime green bud with decent trichome covering and uniform orange hairs
column5: nothing special about the smell either
column6: slightly earthy with a hint of OG. However upon ...â€"

column3:
â€œTried this as a sample and found the effects to be SUPERIOR! I suffer from acute muscle spasms due to a acute back injury- wake up 6 to 7 times a night and was always tired. 
Not only was I surprised by the incredibly spicy aroma and the taste, (oh my word!!!!!!) but for the first time in years I slept for 5 solid hours straight- no muscle spasms to blow me out of bed????
Either they were minor enough for me to sleep...â€
â€œvery relaxing, not for beginners. extremely potent!â€

â€œJust picked up this Indica for the first time yesterday and I could not be more happy. Nice big, dense buds with some red hairs mixed in and a nice dusting of crystals covering the entire bud. When smoked you get a smooth but pungent taste with subtle hints berry and pine. This is a great strain for smoking after a hard day's work. It will leave you relaxed,happy, and take away any pain you might have. A couple of mo...â€

â€œThis is some beautiful bud I just picked this up yesterday at the Greenhouse in Glendale Az it is sticky and wow it's sparkle is amazing! I also enjoy the taste but most important it gets you really high and helped with my severe back pain! I love this strain great job on this guys grown to perfection!!!!â€

â€œBlack Water is great. But I couldn't buy any on  420 because your setup was ridiculous. I was told it would be an hour,  after 2 hours of not even getting inside the door.  No water,  no bathroom.  Never go to The Greenhouse on 420, it sucks,  no matter what The Greenhouse thinks.â€

â€œRelaxed. I do not give a fuck about anything. I really dig the smell. It's almost like a subtle men's cologne. Woodsy and something a little flowery. Lavender, maybe. The high is heady at first but melts into a full-body relaxation. Fantastic strain for anxiety and stress.â€

â€œI love the earthy scent and taste and stress ebbs away.  It eases the pain (from herniated discs) and helps manage the pain.  This is the best strain I have smoked in quite in while when it comes to relieving stress and tension relief and most everyone knows that tension is what makes back pain worse.â€

â€œBlackwater smells like a delightful fruit medley soaked in gasoline and the juice at the bottom of your compost bin, but microdosing this strain seems to have a really great effect on my depression. I am much more calm, peaceful, and my concentration isn't impaired at all. Good Stuff â„¢â€

â€œI was pleasantly surprised after letting this strain absorb and do its thing.  it is at first subtle, then it unfolds a couple of levels deeper into a mind and body relaxation and serious chair/couch lock.  it truly evolved beyond my first impression after the first 20-30 minutes.â€

â€œI reviewed this strain a while ago and was impressed with its ability to knock out insomnia.  I  was lucky enough to get my hands on some more, and I want to explain what makes it different from most other Indicas.   Blackwater does not have the staggeringly high THC counts you will find in some other  strains.  It seems to have the perfect blend of cannabinoids. and terpenes, to make this strain almost narcotic.  3-...â€

â€œvery beautiful  buds, almost a forrest green covered with what looks like sugar there are so many trichromes.  I have what I like to call an absolute immunity to indica's effects, basically I smoke predominantly indica's & have raised my tolerance. Considerably, however Blackwater blew me away.  Upon finishing a bong load I was able to relax and slowly drift to sleep.â€

â€œBlackwater smells like a delightful fruit medley soaked in gasoline and the juice at the bottom of your compost bin, but microdosing this strain seems to have a really great effect on my depression. I am much more calm, peaceful, and my concentration isn't impaired at all. Good Stuff â„¢â€
â€œAmazing! Cured me of my almost crippling chronic migraines, takes away the pain and the light sensitivity.â€
â€œI haven't smoked in 25 years, so I found this an INCREDIBLY powerful strain. I was pinned to my sofa. Once I eased into it, I was light headed and silly. Slept like a baby with no pain.â€

â€œGrabbed this at new place locally. Was told it was strong.. Holy crap they were not kidding. This is one of the best strains I have ever had. Its up there in my top 3. Bit harsh on the pulls, and its a creeper. One min i was asking how long ago next I played eq for about 12 hours. I didnt notice the time go at all. Recommend highly.â€

â€œHard hitting strain! It's only been like 30 mins since my first hit and I don't even need another one for a bit. this made me almost cough up lung INSTANTLY! Heavy menthol/diesel was caught in my lungs and burning feeling stayed in my chest. I feel like I sucked on a 94 Honda Civics' tail pipe that is in desperate need of a smog check! The reason I took away a star was cause the burning feeling embeds itself in your ...â€

â€œDon't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)â€
â€œHelps with insomnia. Vaporize 1 hour before bedtime.â€

â€œSo this is my second favourite strain ever next to white widow. Excellent for ptsd symptoms and really great for sleep. I can not recommend this enough. I have been splurging for the higher priced stuff as to get good quality grass. But this one is a big time favourite.â€

â€œBest for nighttime use. That being said, this shit is super stoney and gave me the munchies like crazy. Tested at 20%. Good for nausea, cramps, stimulating appetite, and headaches. Like I said suuuper stoney, definitely a strong indica.â€
â€œrelajante, una sola dosificacion y el efecto analgesico intenso.â€

â€œDon't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)â€

â€œSo this is my second favourite strain ever next to white widow. Excellent for ptsd symptoms and really great for sleep. I can not recommend this enough. I have been splurging for the higher priced stuff as to get good quality grass. But this one is a big time favourite.â€
â€œSo far this is my favorite nighttime strain. Really packs a punch and hits pretty quick (about 10-15 min for me). After the initial hit its real mellow and the smell is amazing!!â€
â€œHelps with insomnia. Vaporize 1 hour before bedtime.â€

â€œBlackwater I smoked last night with my wife. I bought a gram at Good Sinse in Fairbanks ak and it measures in at 25.06% thc and 0.06% cbd. I smoked 2 hits off a new silicone pipe we just bought and it hit like a champ and we were knocked out in 20 mins. this is my favorite indica strain by far. I'm glad we have found a good indica. for our wake n bake this morning we have a .05 gram Kali cuah joint we got for 5$ at t...â€

â€œWow caked up in crystals. Taste of danky suny aroama left in air after bong rip(load).. Not something I keep in my roation for sure go to strain. Now I know the potency this plant has and I really can dig it. Top 5 if quality is good and fresh. Strictly my pov.â€

â€œBest for nighttime use. That being said, this shit is super stoney and gave me the munchies like crazy. Tested at 20%. Good for nausea, cramps, stimulating appetite, and headaches. Like I said suuuper stoney, definitely a strong indica.â€

â€œWow caked up in crystals. Taste of danky suny aroama left in air after bong rip(load).. Not something I keep in my roation for sure go to strain. Now I know the potency this plant has and I really can dig it. Top 5 if quality is good and fresh. Strictly my pov.â€

â€œDon't remember what pain scale was as this strain was a couple of days ago. Nausea has been off the hook lately. Medicated round 2000 or so. Pain/nausea gone. No anxiety/paranoia. Tastes like blackberries. I go big sleepy. It was great. Highly recommend for nighttime/bedtime use! :-)â€

â€œI have been using this one for awhile now. It is one of my more preferred indicas. It has a very mellow tea and earth flavor that isnt great but isnt bad or overpowering. 

It has the traditional indica head high and it will absolutely creep up on you so take your time with it. I feel control of my thoughts start to slightly slip away  into the water " so this strain is better suited for bedtime or when you are done...â€"
â€œI haven't smoked in 25 years, so I found this an INCREDIBLY powerful strain. I was pinned to my sofa. Once I eased into it, I was light headed and silly. Slept like a baby with no pain.â€

â€œIt's fine, it's just not spectacular. Lot of other great kushes and hybrids. If this works for you, you should feel relaxed, sorta warm, at ease. Maybe good for a social setting where nerves are an issue. I'd also recommend to take at night as a sleep aid. One thing I liked was how smooth this was; I hit it pretty hard with almost zero cough. Again, if you have blackwater, you'll enjoy it. Beginners and light smokers...â€
â€œI have almost an immunity to the sleepy effects of any indica because of my tolerance, I can rely on this strain for insomnia relief.  Blackwater is almost purple/grape tasting.â€

â€œI haven't got a proper diagnosis of IBS, but I haven't had diarrhea in 3 days since I've been smoking this. if you have any stomach issues, I hope you give this one a try. 
you're definitely spacey and forget what you're doing half the time. you're body feels extremely heavy and all you want to do is sleep. I also have had the best sleep of my life on this strain AND I am pain free! my neck doesn't hurt from the whip...â€
â€œThis had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high
â€œunbelievable strength for pain, the best I have tried so far. I bought it at a cannabis event for $5 a gram and it is the best $5 grab I've ever spent.â€

â€œThis strain is extremely potent and fast acting. The effect is very pronounced in the head with moderate body. I did not find this strain to be pain releiving, and it not a medicine I'd use if I needed to get stuff (anything) done. This is definitely a night time or rainy day strain.â€

â€œDefinetly a great solid Indica. Hungry, Happy, Horny, so who could complain. Also excellent at lifting my mood and making me laugh. Very smooth smoke with a piney - lemony like taste but definetly a solid go to Indica & a good strain to keep in the medicine cabinet for depression,  anxiety, mood, & a good old laugh.â€

â€œIt's not her it's me. I have PTSD. And as much as I love how relaxed my body feels. I can't stand the paranoia on it. She makes me think about too much. If you struggle with being in your head too much and have PTSD. This isn't a strain for you. My suggestion is to take a pinch of it in your vape or your blunt. And smoke maybe two hits depending on how low of a tolerance you have for THC. You don't need a lot of this...â€

â€œDef a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.â€
â€œpretty stony, the price is decent too. I haveâ€

â€œI loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.â€

â€œI loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.â€
â€œThis had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high
â€œThis strain is ok . It's definitely calms and relaxs you . Takes my fiance's anxiety away like she never had it . But not all thatâ€

â€œThis is one of the first three strains I got from a dispensary in Jersey after getting my card in the mail that day. I got it for anxiety, and needless to say I was eager to try it when I got home. I loaded the vaporizer once and I was out like a light. Great strain. Highly recommend.â€

â€œI recently picked up some AAAA Blackwater from my dispensary and I have to give it a solid 5.3/5. The smoke wasn't harsh and the high settles behind the eyes about 8secs after a hit. This is definitely an evening/night time strain. I made the mistake of hitting a bowl before my 8 am class and I turned into a luke warm honey bun for the rest of the dayâ€

â€œThis is one of the strongest Indica strains that I have tried. 
I was definitely impressed. 
I love itâ€
â€œIf youâ€™re looking to relax and chill for the remainder of the day or night this is the perfect strain. With the hints of purple in the buds you know youâ€™re in for a great smoke.â€

â€œVery stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.â€

â€œI recently picked up some AAAA Blackwater from my dispensary and I have to give it a solid 5.3/5. The smoke wasn't harsh and the high settles behind the eyes about 8secs after a hit. This is definitely an evening/night time strain. I made the mistake of hitting a bowl before my 8 am class and I turned into a luke warm honey bun for the rest of the dayâ€
â€œLove this strain! Just got done smoking it and I get high very quickly, it does have a heavy lung feeling too it. It's good for watching anything comical, and can get the munchiesâ€
â€œThis had such a fantastically blissful blast off" euphoric high

â€œThis strain is extremely potent and fast acting. The effect is very pronounced in the head with moderate body. I did not find this strain to be pain releiving, and it not a medicine I'd use if I needed to get stuff (anything) done. This is definitely a night time or rainy day strain.â€

â€œI loved this strain for a multitude of purposes. I'm an every day smoker so I was using heavily during the day, but I wouldn't recommend that for most. lol. some of the best sleep I have ever had. I've noticed a decrease in my anxiety and less depressing episodes.â€

â€œDefinitely a night strain. Buds are beautiful with some nice purple coloration and lots of beautiful trichomes. Iâ€™m a newbie so do take this lightly, but I loved how it tasted. Smooth taste. I can clearly taste the berries, surprisingly, with a bit of a watermelon hitting me slightly right at the end of the exhale. Helps me sleep like a baby. Definitely recommend it.â€

â€œVery stoney strain. Definite couch lock, relaxing, nice smoke to relieve stress and pain, but don't expect to get much done for a couple hours. Thanks to TCC in Mesa for another quality medication.â€

â€œThis strain, in flower and concentrate is pure heaven. The taste reminds me of a combination between cotton candy and the smell of dew outside after a rainstorm.  Both memories combine to give you a nostalgic feel without taking one hit yet. The nugs are soft and fluffy and smell extremely sweet. The smoke is smooth and tasty, With the Effects coming on fairly fast  physically and you feel like youâ€™ve been wrapped up...â€

â€œDefinitely a night strain. Buds are beautiful with some nice purple coloration and lots of beautiful trichomes. Iâ€™m a newbie so do take this lightly, but I loved how it tasted. Smooth taste. I can clearly taste the berries, surprisingly, with a bit of a watermelon hitting me slightly right at the end of the exhale. Helps me sleep like a baby. Definitely recommend it.â€

â€œDef a heavy hitter..rolled up an L of some and could feel the high creep it on the way to work..that was at 7...it's 1 o'clock and I'm still feeling it...mellow mood..could sit here all day and do nothing at all, and that would be okay with me.â€

The smoke is smooth and tasty, With the Effects coming on fairly fast  physically and you feel like youâ€™ve been wrapped up...â€

â€œWHOA! Iâ€™m a heavy indica smoker, and this strain stands the fuck out from the crowd. I recently went through a breakup and usually when Iâ€™m heartsick I like to write music, but nothing was happening. I was creatively constipated, lol. Iâ€™m smoking this tonight and it feels like I canâ€™t STOP writing music. I donâ€™t know I just needed to jump on here and tell you guys that uplifting and creative doesnâ€™t begin to describe...â€

â€œOpened up my eighth & smelled a sweet fruity grape scent. Buds were medium to dark green with a ton of trichomes & amber colored pistils covering the bud. Taste i got was a fruity pine. Got an mellow relaxed high which can put you to sleep at the end of the day like a lot of Indica's. The strain may have received the Third Best Indica Strain at the 2014 Los Angeles Cannabis Cup but, i just found it to average because...â€
â€œpretty stony, the price is decent too. I haveâ€

â€œReally chill smoke, a hella relaxing body high and a mild head buzz. I smoked it in the middle of the day which was definitely a bad idea as I was pretty sleepy for the rest of the day. Quality flavor though and leaves a nice taste in your mouth for awhile after. Also very easy to function on.â€

â€œBlackwater is darn tasty strain dispensary's in West Valley,AZ keep setting the bar higher and higher on this strain.Love picking this up taste and flavor's of Coolwater cologne and deep grape juice Tang taste.Love enjoy this strain at night for sleep or to browse the star's and watch F16's-F35's @ night in AZ.
Have not seen bucking UFO's yet :(â€

â€œmediocre, lasts long enough, sedative, lackingâ€
â€œMy favorite medical skunky bud. Can't get enough of this!â€
â€œAmazing!â€

â€œThis review is coming from my personal opinion after smoking 500 mg of blackwater in the form of a co2 distillate vape cartridge. In my opinion this gives the best flavor, which for me was fruity, more of a grape taste as listed above.
